start.text:
You arrive in Lorecraft with the feeling that the world has already been paying attention.

Not judging—just… noticing.

teach_basics.text:
VerseCraft basics: You make choices.
Choices can change state. State changes what choices appear.

WEALTH is your profile: W E A L T H. HP is your survival meter.

hp_test.text:
A loose panel snaps underfoot. You stumble—hard.

You take a hit. It’s not deadly, but it’s enough to prove a point: HP matters.

after_hit.text:
Your breath steadies. If you have a Bandage, you can use it from Inventory to recover HP.

(Inventory → Consumables → Use.)

end.text:
That’s the core loop: story + choices + stats + items.

Next: we’ll make the tutorial less mysterious and more explicitly instructional.
